message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000.  I believe it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is a very competitive price for a product of this caliber.
I'm still a bit above my budget, can you meet me at $14,000? I really think this product could be a great fit for me.
